tasks.task: Install irrigation system in high tunnel.
subtasks: Position header pipe near water tower.
Run two-inch lay flat pipe from header to tunnel end.
Add 90-degree fitting to redirect pipe downward toward water tower.
Install three-quarter inch hose at tunnel end for drip tape connection.
Clamp connections between pipe segments and hose.
Connect garden hose to irrigation adapter.
Attach Teflon tape for added security on garden hose connection.
Position half-inch poly pipe for drip tape distribution.
Secure filter, splices, and pressure regulator components.
Use puncture tool to create drip tape holes.
Seal ends of drip tape with localized clamps and tape.
Terminate poly pipe connections with heat-fitted transitions.
Prepare to install Bluetooth irrigation controller (unsuccessful due to time constraints).

tasks.task: Compile materials and plan for continuation.
subtasks: Note hardware and tools required for remaining installation steps.
Mark installation progress and plan future video segments.
Prepare to address potential weather delays in follow-up videos.

tasks.task: Install irrigation system in high tunnel.
Compile materials and plan for continuation.
